priority_sites.name: World of Playing Cards
priority_sites.notes: Collaborative archive with 1000+ decks. Categories: Advertising (448), Art (314), Souvenir (255), Political (190), History (170), Tarot (161). Historical decks from 1638 to modern.

priority_sites.name: Columbia University - Albert Field Collection
priority_sites.notes: 6,300+ decks (16th-20th centuries). Digitized, public domain. Pre-1801 cards digitized.

priority_sites.name: Metropolitan Museum of Art
priority_sites.notes: Open Access policy (free commercial use). Luxury cards from 1430-1540. High-res downloads.

priority_sites.name: Aeclectic Tarot
priority_sites.notes: 2,000+ tarot and oracle decks with reviews, ratings, sample images. Best browsing gallery.

priority_sites.name: CleanArchives Tarot
priority_sites.notes: Restored high-res public domain tarot images. Commercial use allowed. Bundled downloads.

card_training_sites.name: Cathy McClelland Tarot
card_training_sites.notes: Tarot card artwork collection, site may need smart_discovery

recommended_workflow.step_1: Use smart_discovery.py to find galleries and images
recommended_workflow.step_2: Use card_config.yaml presets appropriate for tarot vs playing card decks
recommended_workflow.step_3: Review dataset in /mnt/storage/imagineer/scraped before importing to albums
notes: Prioritize high_priority sites during telemetry verification
Track progress metrics (discovered/downloaded) to benchmark new telemetry UI
